typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdata
empdata select(mapColumn(
		Empid = empid,
		EmpName = empName,
		Age = age
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
